channel.title: Players on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Players on Home

item.title: Players
item.description: Battles per Player The graph shows the number of battles fought per player during the update 9.5. On average, players played 229 battles and the median battle count was 115. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.
